official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to authorize the United States Postal Service to approve advertisements to which U.S. postage stamps are affixed.

summary.text: Authorizes the United States Postal Service to approve the attachment of postage stamps to advertisements which promote the products or services of private business. Describes such advertisements as those to which a postage stamp is permanently attached and whose dimensions are such that the advertisement can be affixed to an envelope or other wrapper and transmitted through the mails in the same manner as mailable items to which only stamps are affixed.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to authorize the United States Postal Service to approve advertisements to which U.S. postage stamps are affixed.
